question: How much?
That's a rip-off.
answer: You want a good getaway and you're hot with a big score in your pocket. You're a media event. What the fuck do you expect?

question: What do I get for those dollars?
answer: You end up in Ireland with good papers and plastic.

question: Via what?
answer: Lear jet to Vancouver. Then commercial to Reykjavik; then Dublin.

question: Reliable?
answer: For those bucks? 100 per cent. I got the plastic on me. The passports will be on the plane. Who's the third?

question: A girl. With her own papers. What are these good for?
answer: Forty-five to sixty days.

question: How soon?
answer: Twenty-four hours.

question: Make it twelve.
answer: You're going for an important ride. If they say twenty-four for it to be right, then it's twenty-four!

question: You checked all around?
answer: All around. You and I go way back, kiddo, I bought you the best.

question: Where's the pick-up?
answer: Santa Monica Airport. They're a legit operation. I won't have details until tomorrow morning. What is it?

question: Eight, ten, twelve hours. For him to set up a new out. After that? He's gone. Bam! Bye- bye. He's the burglary cop with the "terrific tip?"
answer: Yeah.

question: Hanna. Where'd it come from? I got Schwartz. Dead. Casals got no liver. He's dying. Don't come on to me with "confidential source" crap!
answer: hauls Hugh up, kicking, punching and bouncing him off the walls. Hugh swings at Bosko.

question: Whose side are you on?
answer: I'm on yours.

question: You slimy piece of shit. What a joke.
answer: You told me you want out from under? You're scared to death of Neil. You wanted out? This is out!

question: What's your end?
answer: You dump broad! How'd I get into this?

question: You dump broad! How'd I get into this?
answer: Hey, hey! Go easy on the lady!

question: Huh?
answer: You heard me. She had a rough ride. Go mix her a drink. Cabinet above the sink.

question: Fuck her.
answer: Get the fuck in there! He's right. And you know it. You think you'd be betraying Chris?

question: Okay. It's me. Tracks back to this union guy, Van Zant. He had some beef with Neil. Neil already settled it. Van Zant got dead earlier tonight. Now Hugh Benny has reformed his wayward life and become a born- again good citizen. So, he's revealed the key player is this cowboy Waingro. Used to be part of Neil's crew. Waingro committed a double murder today on Towner, a driver, and his old lady. Meanwhile Waingro's checked into the Airport Hyatt House under "Jamieson." Maybe Neil will make a move on him, but not likely. Get the word to bailbondsmen, bookies, snitches in County, etc. where Waingro is. And get a team down there to set it up.
answer: Want me to do it?

question: No. You stay on who's agenting Neil's getaway. What have you got?
answer: Nothing yet.

question: What did you do? Was that you?
answer: It's what I don't do. I don't sell swimming pools. It would have been okay. You would have flown out after. You didn't need to do a thing. Now I'm jammed. We got to go together. Because we get dropped in a place and then I decide

question: What.
answer: I rob and steal for a living. Do you understand?

question: You killed people?
answer: If they got in the way. Yes. It's their problem.

question: The woman on the grass...where her husband got shot..
answer: Elaine Cerrito. Michael Cerrito's wife. Michael was my friend. He knew the risks. He didn't have to be there. He coulda been a...been a mailman.

question: I don't believe it.
answer: Believe it. Eady. Get packed. Get dressed. Let's go. Eady! !

question: Why you do this to me! What I do to you?!
answer: Shut up! Use these credit cards. They say "Mr. and Mrs." I reserved the car. Buy me some clothes. Here's a list. I can't go home for my stuff. Can you do it?

question: When's it over?
answer: Twenty-two hours. Then we fly out of here...clean.

question: I want you to let me go. When will you let me go?
answer: You can go now. There's the door, you want out...

question: No, I have to do what you say. But will you let me leave after?

question: It's ready... enters, sees Hanna. Oh. Meet Vincent.
answer: What's your name? I'm Vincent Hanna.

question: Don't you even get angry?
answer: I'm angry. Ralph, you can ball my wife. You can lounge around her $1.7 million condominium on her sofa. You can do all those things. But you do not get to watch my fucking TV...! I've never screwed around. I've been true blue to you since the day we met.

question: It would have been preferable if you had! You made me do this!
answer: Right I had Ralph fuck you 'cause it makes me feel so good.

question: Put down the television. You look ridiculous. Dr. Prince says I'm trying to get your attention. Christ! I have to pay someone to figure out my life with you.
answer: Shut up!

question: Why's it my job to figure it all out and explain it to you?
answer: 'Cause you're the one who spends all the time on the couch.

question: And what do you do?
answer: What do I do? I speak the English language. Words. Sentences even.

question: How admirable
answer: Thank you.

question: Use the Camaro. Its clean and will stand a DMV check.

question: Someone's picking me up.
answer: A girl on the side?

question: See you, cowboy.
answer: So long, brother.

question: Yeah?
answer: Hi ya. Yeah, Breedan's end?

question: Still can't find nobody. It's in the Delaware Trust. You tell me later what to do. And about your ride. No changes. Right on schedule.
answer: Okay...

question: I figured you wouldn't waste the time.
answer: You figured right. Take it easy, old man.

question: You take it easy. Be careful, huh?
answer: That was the last bridge. gets in and hugs her desperately. It's the most emotional we've ever seen him. Eady responds not at all. Neil lets her loose.

question: Go ahead!
answer: Don't touch him! Accessory. Armed robbery and murder one. Dealing stolen merchandise and securities. You agent for Neil. At least the armored car and bank. Everything I tie him into, I tie you into. Two cops dead. Other bodies on the sidewalk. You understand that kind of heat? You fucking get it!

question: Neil who...?
answer: Book him on Accessory to Armed Robbery, Murder One, A.D.W., and Trafficking Stolen Merchandise. The Nazi's in Quentin will turn your ass into a satchel. You're an old man. Gimme Neil!

question: What I'll give you is so many false arrest lawsuits, you won't have time to write traffic tickets!

question: Fuck McCauley. You handle it. Call Bosko and Drucker in. Get me at the hospital after.

question: Yeah.
answer: Be careful, Vincent. Be very careful... Let's keep on trying?

question: Casals come in.
answer: Vincent. I'm in the southeast stairwell.

question: What's the situation?
answer: Three teams are moving up the other three stairwells to the 14th floor. Elevators are out of commission because of the fire alarm. Surveillance said McCauley looked right at 'em. Didn't seem surprised.

question: It means he knew we were here and came anyway.
answer: I got two Special Weapons Teams deployed at the front and back exits. Choppers.
